m_szDocTitle: U.S. stock futures pare losses on housing data - MarketWatch
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- U.S. stock futures pare losses on housing data Published: Feb 25, 2014 9:25 a.m. ET Share China tightens liquidity, hitting Shanghai Composite; S&P 500 to take new run at record By Markets reporter WilliamL. Watts NEW YORK (MarketWatch) — U.S. stock index futures pared losses Tuesday after a gauge of house prices and looked ahead to consumer-confidence data and a couple of Fed speakers. Home prices ticked down in December, but with seasonal adjustments, prices of homes in 20 cities tracked by S&P/Case-Shiller rose 0.8%. Futures on the Dow Jones Industrial Avera
